member.name: T:CLMath.Convert
member.summary: Class for converting one type to another

member.name: M:CLMath.Convert.ToInt32(System.String)
member.summary:
Converts String to a 32bit Interger
Returns -1 if it failed to convert

member.name: M:CLMath.Convert.ToInt64(System.String)
member.summary:
Converts String to a 64bit Interger
Returns -1 if it failed to convert

member.name: M:CLMath.Convert.ToReal32(System.String)
member.summary:
Converts String to a 32bit Real
Returns -1 if it failed to convert

member.name: M:CLMath.Convert.ToReal64(System.String)
member.summary:
Converts String to a 64bit Real
Returns -1 if it failed to convert
